title: Possible team speak?? (W/ recording!)

replies.body: For what? Why stands in the title teamspeak?
replies.body_tagged: For what? Why stands in the title teamspeak?

replies.body:
I think you misunderstood by what people meant when they said you could record with youtubers in "teamspeak".

Teamspeak is to be found HERE and is basically the same as skype in that you can talk to your friends but on Teamspeak you can setup different lounges ,give ranks etc etc etc. If you want to join the Avicus teamspeak you can join using ts.avicus.net.

I hope this cleared it up a bit for you :P
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
http://www.teamspeak.com/

but if you don't know how to use teamspeak you could use skype.
teamspeak is basicly like skype but with channels and its more public. most avicus people and forums members use it. i haven't talked to anyone in this community for 6 days :C
